body_content.explanation: making an unpleasant musical sound, or not making a pleasant harmony (= the pleasing sound of notes being played or sung together):
examples: The loud inharmonious wailing continued for hours.
I did not find the two voices inharmonious, although they are different in pitch.
You may become the mediator and peacemaker in inharmonious situations.
Even between the most devoted of life-mates there will come inharmonious moments.

body_content.explanation: not looking, tasting, or working well together:
examples: The somewhat inharmonious modern building on the south side of the square houses a section of the new university.
Red and green together are a very inharmonious colour combination, I find.
